name: Girlfriend is Missing
description:
A 2D (almost horror) puzzle game where your girlfriend is missing.

You're in her house looking for clues.

Instructions:

WASD or Arrows: Move

E or Space: Interaction

Credits for assets used:

https://assetbakery.itch.io/horror-house-tileset

https://route1rodent.itch.io/16x16-rpg-character-sprite-sheet

Released as a graduate project.
